title: oc 5 can't share to both users and groups
body:
i upgraded to oc 5 on a test box from 4.5.8 and i  can't share to both users and groups. we use apple open ldap and all of the groups and users show up as expected. you can share to both users and groups you belong to when the toggle for "allow users to only share with users in their groups" is selected. however if "allow users to share with anyone" is selected groups don't appear to be in the list of choices for sharing. 

this means you can't share to users not in your group when you get access to the groups listing and you don't get groups at all when you get access to all users.

to upgrade we really need the functionality to be the way it was in 4.5.x because teachers aren't in the student groups or the admin groups. making files available to entire student groups works really well in 4.5.x and sharing things with admin users individually when you aren't in the respective groups also works nicely.

we really appreciate the work that goes into this product, and i hope the group functionality in the 5.x series can eventually replicate what was in 4.5.x because the interface and features really are nicer in the newer version.

the oc server is currently running on os x 10.8.3, but i have tested on ubuntu vm to make sure the problem isn't os x specific

owncloud version: 5.0.7
webserver: apache
database: mysql
os: mac os x server
php version: 5.3.15
